Text:
Damn. I got an angry letter fro my ISP telling me to remove all copyrighted material (Stargate.Universe.S01E08.720p.HDTV.x264-SiTV.mkv). It seems MGM tracked it.   though i don't know if they just do it by random and i was simply just unlucky.
Anything i can do to prevent beeing tracked in the future?

i was traced also.
whats the deal, help me out.
Move to Canada, no laws against downloading up here
